EventComponent.Name: Power Outage
EventComponent.Title: Power Outage
EventComponent.Abstract: A broad power shutdown will begin on August 23 at 5:00 p.m. and conclude at 5:00 a.m. the following morning. Because of this the Online Support Center will not be open between 5:00-7:00 p.m. Wednesday, Augurst 23rd. The buildings affected on campus are: Austin, AG Mechanics, Auxiliary Services, Benson, University Operations, Power Plant, Biddulph, Rigby, and the BYU-Idaho Center. Please call 496-2500 for any questions.
